alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 8:45PM EDT until September 07 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Talbot County in eastern Maryland... Caroline County in eastern Maryland... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 845 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Matthews, or near Easton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Easton, Denton, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Preston, Goldsboro, Queen Anne, Tanyard, Harmony, Smithville, Jumptown, Agner, Matthews, Griffin, Windyhill, Cordova, Hillsboro and Henderson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Mount Holly NJ.
